title: Fatal Error on __debuginfo for php 8.4.1 with Xdebug active
body:
### Description

Running cakephp 5.2.5 on MAMP PRO 7.2 running on php 8.4.1 and Xdebug active the following error appears:
```
( ! ) Warning: Uncaught Error: Typed property Cake\ORM\Table::$_associations must not be accessed before initialization in /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/Table.php:3283

Stack trace: #0 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/BehaviorRegistry.php(83): Cake\ORM\Table->__debugInfo()
#1 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/Table.php(326): Cake\ORM\BehaviorRegistry->setTable(Object(DebugKit\Model\Table\RequestsTable))
#2 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/Locator/TableLocator.php(318): Cake\ORM\Table->__construct(Array)
#3 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/Locator/TableLocator.php(271): Cake\ORM\Locator\TableLocator->_create(Array)
#4 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/Datasource/Locator/AbstractLocator.php(68): Cake\ORM\Locator\TableLocator->createInstance('DebugKit.Reques...', Array)
#5 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/Locator/TableLocator.php(211): Cake\Datasource\Locator\AbstractLocator->get('DebugKit.Reques...', Array)
#6 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/Locator/LocatorAwareTrait.php(96): Cake\ORM\Locator\TableLocator->get('DebugKit.Reques...', Array)
#7 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/debug_kit/src/ToolbarService.php(276): DebugKit\ToolbarService->fetchTable('DebugKit.Reques...')
#8 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/debug_kit/src/Middleware/DebugKitMiddleware.php(67): DebugKit\ToolbarService->saveData(Object(Cake\Http\ServerRequest), Object(Cake\Http\Response))
#9 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/Http/Runner.php(82): DebugKit\Middleware\DebugKitMiddleware->process(Object(Cake\Http\ServerRequest), Object(Cake\Http\Runner))
#10 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/Http/Runner.php(60): Cake\Http\Runner->handle(Object(Cake\Http\ServerRequest))
#11 /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/Http/Server.php(104): Cake\Http\Runner->run(Object(Cake\Http\MiddlewareQueue), Object(Cake\Http\ServerRequest), Object(App\Application))
#12 /opt/app/webroot/index.php(37): Cake\Http\Server->run()
#13 {main} thrown in /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/Table.php on line 3283

( ! ) Fatal error: __debuginfo() must return an array in /opt/app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/ORM/BehaviorRegistry.php on line 83
```

I got this error on my own app but could reproduce the exact same behavior with the example app from github.com/cakephp/app.git . Same errors are logged on a docker image with php 8.4.6 but ends in a  " AH00051: child pid 26 exit signal Segmentation fault (11), possible coredump in /etc/apache2" and a "The connection was reset" on the browser


Disabling Xdebug seems to be a workaround

### CakePHP Version

5.2.5

### PHP Version

8.4
